All Classes|All Packages

S

ServerStart - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is responsible for starting the server and to create a new thread when a client wants to communicate with the server.
It also keeps track of the users that are logged in.
ServerStart() - Constructor for class ServerStart
 
ServerThread - Class in <Unnamed>
This class handles all the communication with the clients, except the Lobby and Game, using a Socket and ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream.
ServerThread(Socket) - Constructor for class ServerThread
Creates an unconnected ServerThread.
setDatabasePath(String) - Static method in class database.SqliteHelper
 
SqliteHelper - Class in database
This class is used to manage the connection to the database.
SqliteHelper() - Constructor for class database.SqliteHelper
 
startRunning() - Method in class ServerThread
Makes the connection to the client and keeps it open until it is closed by the client.
